level.text: The Commission may, for good cause, waive any rule under Chapter 25 unless the rule contains a provision that is expressly required by statute.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Notice of Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 2601 (April 14, 2000); as amended by Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 5778 (July 14, 2000).
